title:
BV estimates between the quasi-stationary measure and the invariant
  measure for systems with small hole and additive noise
abstract:
In this paper we introduce a class of non uniformly expanding random
dynamical system with additive noise and we prove a BV estimate between the
stationary measure and the quasistationary measure of the system. Furthermore,
we use these bounds to give precise estimates for the Lyapunov exponent of the
system.
